title: Ticket #7463: Add common OAuth endpoints to param table
description: Common OAuth endpoints for cloud storage services, like Box.com, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive, should already exist in the param table so that the condor configuration for enabling these services only involves adding the client id and secret keys.
remarks:
2020-Apr-06 08:49:17 by jpatton:
Let's actually clean things up a bit. No more user URL in the config, that should be a lookup table in the credmon. And let's add a token type param that gets added to the meta file so that the credmon knows what to lookup.

2020-Apr-07 13:05:48 by jpatton:
Token type not needed, credmon can look at domain in urls passed to it.
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.

2020-May-18 13:12:08 by zmiller:
CODE REVIEW Looks good. No version history needed. Resolving.
check_ins:
